quest.name: Dearest Daughter
journal: This elderly private needs help finding someone.
objectives: Speak with the soldiers at Castrum Oriens.

dialogue.name: ELDERLYPRIVATE02869
dialogue.text: Sorry to bother you, but would you mind helping me look for my daughter? She headed off in the direction of Castrum Oriens quite a while ago and should've been back by now.

dialogue.name: ELDERLYPRIVATE02869
dialogue.text: Would you mind asking the Alliance soldiers there if they've seen her?

dialogue.name: ELDERLYPRIVATE02869
dialogue.text: She has blonde hair and brown eyes. Last I heard she had been dispatched to fight at Baelsar's Wall. Please, bring her back to me!

dialogue.name: ELDERLYPRIVATE02869
dialogue.text: She has blonde hair and brown eyes. Last I heard she had been dispatched to fight at Baelsar's Wall. Please, bring her back to me!

dialogue.name: SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE
dialogue.text: Ah, [GC Rank][GC Rank][GC Rank] Surname! To what do we owe the pleasure?

dialogue.name: SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE
dialogue.text: Hmm, I cannot say anyone here matches that description. That said, I do faintly recall hearing of a gentleman searching for such a lady in the past.

dialogue.name: SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE
dialogue.text: It may be worth your while asking some of my subordinates if they know aught.

dialogue.name: KAKALAI
dialogue.text: A blonde female soldier? Sorry, no one comes to mind.

dialogue.name: LOEZKIRZ
dialogue.text: I've seen a Miqo'te that matches that description, but no Hyurs.

dialogue.name: PIP
dialogue.text: Cannot say I have seen anyone like that around here. You may have better luck asking a member of the Order of the Twin Adder. This is their post after all.

dialogue.name: SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE
dialogue.text: It may be worth your while asking some of my subordinates if they know aught.

dialogue.name: KAKALAI
dialogue.text: A blonde female soldier? Sorry, no one comes to mind.

dialogue.name: LOEZKIRZ
dialogue.text: I've seen a Miqo'te that matches that description, but no Hyurs.

dialogue.name: PIP
dialogue.text: Cannot say I have seen anyone like that around here. You may have better luck asking a member of the Order of the Twin Adder. This is their post after all.

dialogue.name: TWINADDERSONSTELOT02869
dialogue.text: Wait, did you just say you were asked to search for this woman by an elderly private?

dialogue.name: TWINADDERSONSTELOT02869
dialogue.text: Losing a loved one is never easy, but it really is about time he accepted reality. His daughter has been dead for a while now.

dialogue.name: TWINADDERSONSTELOT02869
dialogue.text: She was seduced by the Griffin's words and joined his forces in the battle at Baelsar's Wall. It was there she breathed her last.

dialogue.name: TWINADDERSONSTELOT02869
dialogue.text: We confirmed as much when we showed her belongings to her father.

dialogue.name: TWINADDERSONSTELOT02869
dialogue.text: However, it seems the shock was too much for him. He has repeatedly visited us since, requesting every time that we look for his daughter.

dialogue.name: TWINADDERSONSTELOT02869
dialogue.text: I will speak with him once more and make sure this does not happen again. My apologies for him sending you on a wild goose chase.
